nodes.text: Primus Goluud was a red supergiant in the Goluud Corridor, orbited by the Primus Goluud system. There were at least three planets orbiting the star.
Shortly after the end of the Unification Wars, one of Ssk Kahorr's drone ships crashed on Primus Goluud while using a hyperlane created by Gav and Jori Daragon.
It was the location of the Battle at Primus Goluud, where it was forced into supernova by a superweapon of Naga Sadow's which destroyed the system.
